name: Bomb Squad Racers
description:
This is the first of (hopefully) many games I make in a week. In this game you play as a bomb squad driver racing around to save the town.  Due to this being a small one week project this is the final state of the game.

-Controls-

W + S,  speed up + speed down

A + D = turning

esc : quit to menu

-Orb Mode-

Rush around to collect bombs for points. If the Timer (bar at top) runs out you die.

collect packs to add time

- Race Mode-

Make it to the finish line

in the lowest time possible
Time will start as soon as you move

Game by Ford4466

"kaph" font used from ggbot on itch

color pallet form nyx8 on lospec
